title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it results in N redraws of the entire client area. This behavior is inefficient and impacts performance.
EB: The expected behavior is that when adding N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it should only trigger a redraw of the affected portion of the client area, not the entire area. This would improve performance and responsiveness.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open an application using StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText widget.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times, impacting performance.
